column5: Im sure many are, i didnt mean it to argue, just saying not all telemarketers are the mob .. though our government is just organized crime anyway so whats the difference. Lol

I don't mean to say that all are run by the mob, but lots of the illegal ones are.  there was a show on tv the other day about how Canada is viewed as a refuge for Italian mafia king pins. I think I recognized a few ex coworkers. Haha

Here's what happens to telemarketing calls in my house... TM - hello, Mr. HH? Me- yup, what's up? TM - I' calling from... Me-  can you hold for a second? TM - sure... Me - hand the phone to my 9 year old daughter and tell her to talk to them about her Pokeman game... TM - still holding for ten minutes... Me - hang up when daughter done her story!  I had a security company call recently... let them babble away until I said "I recently upgraded my home security and I went and installed the BFD system." "What's the BFD system sir, never heard of it" was the response. "Big Ass Dog" was my answer... they haven't called back. HH

I was visiting my grandfather at the nursing home last week when he received a call. He was getting incredibly frustrated so I asked him to give me the phone. I told them that I was speaking on behalf of my grandfather who was in a nursing home and not mentally fit to make any decisions. (the truth) They apologized several times and said that they would never call back again without me ever asking them not to call again. lol! First time that's ever happened.  I personally screen all my calls and if it's a not a name or number that I recognize, I just don't answer. If it's important they'll leave a message. Started doing that when I was going through my divorce...
Come up with a program and collect 50K........   http://www.pcmag.com/article2/0,2817,2411178,00.asp

GEEKS
river-rat, HAHA!

I have the fix  and have had it now for quite a few years and it go's like this : just because the phone's ringing dose'nt mean you have to answer it . Try it some time  . We don't answer any calls  that we don't recgonize  , instead we let the machine take them and we screen them later when its conveniant .

Yah guess what happens to the guy that does this. Do you all know who is making the illegal robo calls? Organized Crime and terrorist organizations. That is 50 grand I would pass up on any day of the week.
Git outta here !!! ??
cant find my keys...can ya give me a ride?
LMAO

I don`t think the problem can be fixed stateside, most of mine come from politicians that have exempted themselves from the do not call list.  LOL, with the public`s approval rating of congress here at a lofty 10% or so I guess they are afraid to call in person?
Dare i ask why either of those groups would be guising as telemarketers and called citizens at random?

The way I now handle telemarketing calls is not only fun but they hang up and never call back...   TM....hello, I'm from company X...blah blah blah...  Me....hi....what are you wearing....  TM....What ? ? ?  ME....Are you gay ? ? ?  TM....What ? ? ?  Me....What are you wearing, I can go either way...  TM....Hung up....gone....  ME....Bye Bye
LOL!

Oh that does work but IF I ever answer this how it goes for me.  Spam: Hello I'm calling from xyz company Me: Oh man your my dad's compition and he would kill me if I used your services! Spam: really? what's his company, is it abc company? Me: I'm not going to say caues he does that for my whole area! Spam: oh ok, thanks.  bye

They get paid to make them. Same goes for spam. Its not legit companies that run the spam email, telemarketing companies. Organized crime runs them. I know this first hand. I used to work for one.  A telemarketing call goes like this in my house....  "Hello is Mr or Mrs Jedimaster home?" "Click"
I used to work for a telemarketing agency as well. It was very legit, excellent training, and good money. I really regret leaving that job, actually. So i think you may be biased in your judgment.
You would be surprised how many internet providers are run by organized crime though!

Did you work for one that was making legal calls... or the illegal ones... trust me on this the people slinging viagra over email, making calls outside of the bounds of whats considered legal are not run by your friendly neighborhood good doer. Alot of what you see around you on a daily basis has mob and gang ties.
